channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sean Combs denied bail, will remain in custody until sentencing
item.description: Combs was convicted on July 2 of two counts of transportation for prostitution. The music mogul had filed a request to be released on bail before his ...

item.title: Their son was shot by police in Bangladesh's 2024 protests. They still want justice
item.description: In July and August of 2024 in Bangladesh, student protesters' push for change drove the authoritarian prime minister out of power. Hundreds of demonst...

item.title: This Tuscan startup sold all its olive oil in the U.S. Then came Trump's tariffs
item.description: Americans love olive oil — and import 95% of it. But tariffs are making it harder for Europeans to sell it to Americans.

item.title: What's the secret to India's moves to conquer the global chess scene?

item.title: Texas and California joust for political advantage, with Trump’s agenda and House majority in play
Should a 70-year-old buy an annuity? Here's what to know now.
item.description: Thinking about buying an annuity at age 70? Here's what to consider before locking in this type of lifetime income.

item.title: Besieged Sudan city residents face starvation, UN warns
item.description: El-Fasher, encircled by RSF paramilitary fighters, has not had food deliveries for over a year.

item.title: Man suspected of killing 4 family members in Tennessee is captured
item.description: The Tennessee Bureau of Investigation announced the arrest of Austin Drummond on Tuesday morning.

item.title: Dozens feared trapped as cloudburst triggers flash floods in India
item.description: Rescue teams have reached Dharali village in Uttarkashi, which is believed to have borne the brunt of the floods.

item.title: Family of Irish missionary kidnapped in Haiti 'devastated'
item.description: Gena Heraty, from County Mayo, was taken with eight other people from an orphanage which she runs.

item.title: Titan submersible disaster that killed 5 on way to Titanic was preventable, Coast Guard says
House committee issues subpoenas for Epstein files, depositions with Clintons and other officials
item.description: The House Oversight Committee has subpoenaed the Justice Department for files in the sex trafficking investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Netanyahu to propose full reoccupation of Gaza, Israeli media report
item.description: The plan will involve a complete takeover of Gaza, but reportedly faces opposition from military chiefs.

item.title: Texas Republicans vote to arrest Democrats blocking plan to re-draw electoral boundaries
item.description: The Democrats facing arrest have fled to block a vote that could sway the balance of power in Washington.
